original_text: An inheritance may be gotten hastily at the beginning; but the end thereof shall not be blessed.
korean_text: 처음에 속히 잡은 산업은 마침내 복이 되지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: An inheritance may be gotten hastily at the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 유산은 처음에 성급하게 얻을 수 있으나

sentences.original_text: but the end thereof shall not be blessed
